An interactive video can consist of any number of video files, and can contain additional image elements on the screen. This article takes a closer look at how to add and configure these media files.

## Add videos
To add a video to the background of the selected scene or pop-up:

- Open the **scene editor**.

- In the **sidebar**, go to **Media **&gt; **Videos**.

- Select one of the media files and click **Add**.

The selected video will be added to the timeline.

> Note

Video elements fill the entire video screen and canâ€™t be resized. Therefore, they should be used primarily as the background layer.

### Configure video elements
Click on the video element in the playback area or its timeline layer to open the settings:

- **Duration**

**Playback rate:** Use the slider to adjust the playback rate (speed) of the video

- **Start and End timestamps:** Enter the exact timestamps to control the start and end of the element

- **Volume:** Use the slider to adjust the volume of the audio track of this video (if any)

> Note

This is a distinct setting from the volume of the [Project soundtrack](/doxee-platform/docs/pvideo-designer-soundtrack).

- **Replace media:** Choose a different video to replace the current one.

- **Delete:** Delete this element and its timeline layer

![Video settings interface showing duration, playback rate, and volume controls.](data:image/png;base64,)

## Add images
To add images to a scene or pop-up:

- Open the **scene editor**.

- In the sidebar, go to **Media **&gt; **Images**.

- Select one of the media files and click **Add**.

The selected image will be added to the timeline.

### Configure image elements
Click on an image element in the playback area or its timeline layer to open the settings:

- **Animation:** Select an animation style and when the animation should be displayed (in, out, in and out)

- **Crop image:** Open the cropping tool and crop the image 

- **Duration:** Enter the exact timestamps to control the start and end of the element

- **Size and position:** Set the size and position of the image element and lock the aspect ratio

> Tip

The size and position of the element can also be adjusted in the playback area using intuitive drag-and-drop controls.

- **Box appearance:** Adjust the color filling of the image background, and configure the border of the image element

- **Replace media:** Choose a different video to replace the current one.

- **Delete:** Delete this element and its timeline layer

![Settings panel displaying animation, duration, size, and appearance options for an image.](data:image/png;base64,)

## Upload your own files
To use your own video or image files, they must be uploaded to the file drive:

- Open the **scene editor**.

- In the **sidebar**, open the **Media **palette.

- Click **My files** &gt; **Upload** and select a file from your local storage.

> Info

Only one file can be uploaded at a time. The supported video and image formats are:

**MP4**

- **PNG**

- **JPG**

- **JPEG**

- Add the uploaded file to the scene or pop-up.
